CustomField.formula: IF(CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, 'GREAT'), "Ripken I'm GREAT", IF(CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, 'Baseball'), 'Ripken Badges for Baseball', IF(CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, 'Special Initiative'), 'Ripken Special Initiative', IF(CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, 'Under Armour'), 'Under Armour', IF(CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, 'Healthy Lifestyles'), 'Ripken Healthy Lifestyles', '')))))
CustomField.label: Application Title
